info.title: Purchase Requisition
info.description:
This service helps you to create, read, update and delete purchase requisitions through an API call from a source system outside SAP S/4HANA. The service contains header, item, account assignment, delivery address, and item text nodes. The information is sent in the request as a payload. The information is used when creating, reading or updating a purchase requisition, with appropriate checks for restricted values and authorizations.

Note: Certain elements can only be used if you activate the business function ISR_RETAILSYSTEM. For more information, see Business Documentation.

x-sap-shortText: Create, read, update and delete purchase requisitions through an API call from a source system outside SAP S/4HANA

get.summary: Gets the item notes of an item in a purchase requisition
get.description: Gets the item notes of an item in a purchase requisition.It is mandatory to provide the purchase requisition number, "PurchaseRequisition", as filter parameter in the request. You may also provide the item number, "PurchaseRequisitionItem", as filter parameter, if required.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

post.summary: Creates an item note of a particular note type in a purchase requisition item
post.description: Creates an item note of a particular note type in a purchase requisition item using the purchase requisition number, item number, text ID that identifies the type of note, reference application object, note description, and language key provided. It is mandatory to pass these parameters in the request body.

parameters.name: PurchaseRequisition
parameters.description: Purchase Requisition Number

parameters.name: PurchaseRequisitionItem
parameters.description: Item number of purchase requisition

parameters.name: DocumentText
parameters.description: Text ID

parameters.name: TechnicalObjectType
parameters.description: Texts: application object

parameters.name: Language
parameters.description: Language Key

get.summary: Gets the item note of a particular note type in a purchase requisition item
get.description: Gets the item note of a particular note type in a purchase requisition item using the purchase requisition number, item number, text ID that identifies the type of note, reference application object, and language key provided. If the item note is not available in the requested language, then it returns the note in the language in which it was created.

parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

patch.summary: Updates the item note of a particular note type in a purchase requisition item
patch.description: Updates the item note of a particular note type in a purchase requisition item using the purchase requisition number, item number, text ID that identifies the type of note, reference application object, and language key provided.

delete.summary: Deletes the item note of a particular note type in a purchase requisition item
delete.description: Deletes the item note of a particular note type in a purchase requisition item using the purchase requisition number, item number, text ID that identifies the type of note, reference application object, and language key provided.

post.summary: Creates a purchase requisition with one or more items
post.description: Creates a purchase requisition with one or more items. If "PurReqnDoOnlyValidation" is set to "True", it simulates the creation of a purchase requisition, and validates the correctness of the payload. In case the validation fails, it returns the errors in the response.

post.summary: Adds a new accounting line to an item in a purchase requisition
post.description: Adds a new accounting line to an item in a purchase requisition using the purchase requisition number, and item number provided. It is mandatory to provide the purchase requisition number, "PurchaseRequisition", and item number,"PurchaseRequisitionItem", in the request body. This operation is only supported as a batch request. Please note that while you add a new accounting line to an item, you must also correspondingly update the accounting details in the purchase requisition item, hence this operation is only supported as a batch request.

parameters.name: PurchaseRequisition
parameters.description: Purchase Requisition Number

parameters.name: PurchaseRequisitionItem
parameters.description: Item number of purchase requisition

parameters.name: PurchaseReqnAcctAssgmtNumber
parameters.description: Serial number for PReq account assignment segment

get.summary: Gets the account assignment details of a particular accounting line of an item in a purchase requisition
get.description: Gets the account assignment details of a particular accounting line of an item in a purchase requisition, using the purchase requisition number, item number, and serial number of the accounting line provided.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

patch.summary: Updates the account assignment details of a particular accounting line of an item in a purchase requisition
patch.description: Updates the account assignment details of a particular accounting line of an item in a purchase requisition, using the purchase requisition number, item number, and serial number of the accounting line provided.

get.summary: Performs validation checks on a purchase requisition
get.description: Performs validation checks on a purchase requisition using the purchase requisition number provided, and returns errors, if any.

parameters.name: PurchaseRequisition
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

post.summary: Transitions external processing status of purchase requisition items, and discards them from purchasing
post.description: Transitions external processing status of purchase requisition items, and discards them from purchasing using the purchase requisition number and item number provided. If the item number is '00000', then the action is applied on all the items in the purchase requisition. This operation can only be applied on purchase requisition items with external processing status as In Process Externally.

parameters.name: PurchaseRequisition
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

parameters.name: PurchaseRequisitionItem
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

post.summary: Transitions external processing status of purchase requisition items, and enables them for purchasing
post.description: Transitions external processing status of purchase requisition items, and enables them for purchasing using the purchase requisition number and item number provided. If the item number is '00000', then the action is applied on all the items in the purchase requisition. This operation can only be applied on purchase requisition items with external processing status as In Process Externally.

parameters.name: PurchaseRequisition
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

parameters.name: PurchaseRequisitionItem
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET A_PurchaseReqnItemText HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
